entry.title: Enveloped by Shadows : The Kidnapping of the Bat Family
entry.summary:
Author: KrystalWolf2001

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,177Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 5

Summary: In the dark underbelly of Gotham City, a centuries-old cult has long thrived, manipulating from the shadows. Their ultimate goal? Total dominion over the city. But there's one formidable obstacle in their path: Bruce Wayne, the enigmatic vigilante known as Batman. Rather than confronting him directly, the cunning cult devises a chilling strategy - to dismantle Batman's resolve by targeting his family, striking at his heart one member at a time. As Bruce struggles to protect those he loves while facing the relentless onslaught of the cult's machinations, he's pushed to his limits, confronting his deepest fears and questioning the essence of his crusade. With each move, the stakes escalate, culminating in a high-stakes showdown where Gotham's fate hangs in the balance, and Batman must confront not just his enemies but also the shadows of his past.
